    Promotes a Vec3 to a Vec4 with an extra component.

    Returns a vector with all components set to negative one.

    Projects one vector onto another.

  • Uses of Vec4 in camzup.kotlin

    Subclasses of Vec4 in camzup.kotlin 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  KtVec4
    Provides Kotlin operator overloading support for four dimensional vectors.
    Methods in camzup.kotlin with parameters of type Vec4 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    KtVec4 KtVec4.div​(Vec4 b)
    Returns a new vector with the division of the instance by the right operand.
    void KtVec4.divAssign​(Vec4 b)
    Divides the instance by the right operand (mutates the vector in place).
    KtVec4 KtVec4.minus​(Vec4 b)
    Returns a new vector with the subtraction of the right operand from the instance.
    void KtVec4.minusAssign​(Vec4 b)
    Subtracts the right operand from the instance (mutates the vector in place).
    KtVec4 KtVec4.plus​(Vec4 b)
    Returns a new vector with the addition of the right operand to the instance.
    void KtVec4.plusAssign​(Vec4 b)
    Adds the right operand to the instance (mutates the vector in place).
    KtVec4 KtVec4.rem​(Vec4 b)
    Returns a new vector with the signed remainder (fmod) of the instance and the right operand.
    void KtVec4.remAssign​(Vec4 b)
    Assigns the signed remainder (fmod) of the instance and the right operand to the instance (mutates the vector in place).
    void KtMat4.set​(int j, Vec4 value)
    Sets a column vector for this matrix.
    KtVec4 KtMat4.times​(Vec4 b)
    Multiplies this matrix and a vector.
    KtVec4 KtVec4.times​(Vec4 b)
    Returns a new vector with the product of the instance and the right operand.
    void KtVec4.timesAssign​(Vec4 b)
    Multiplies the right operand with the instance (mutates the vector in place).
